Each line is of the form:
[correct]
[message guess]
[key guess]

Four hours of steady work faced us.
athe sthes et hesthe sest heeth es.
fkbg dagra rq weeakj ecrk facga di.

The box was thrown beside the parked truck.
ahe ack the theset hesedt hes thesac kthes.
mhe hue oth thrxgi nhsslo rlr progre brucy.
